item.description:
All organizers, or members interested in organizing for the New Haven Rock Climbing are invited to attend this group planning meeting. We'll have some snacks and adult beverages on hand.

Bring your thoughts, ideas, criticisms, etc. Some topics on the agenda are:

* New mission / charter for NHRC
* New Event Ideas / re-working of current meetups
* Raising funds for NHRC and possible creation of Treasurer position
* Recruitment of new organizers to NHRC and for what purpose
* Best ways to handle newbies in our meetups
* Benefits for NHRC organizers
* Your thoughts, hopes, and dreams for NHRC

Interested in organizing for NHRC Meetup or have ideas you'd like to share with the group? If yes, we'd love to have your input. We are looking to add some new co-organizers. If you're interested, please come to this meetup or email nate@ctrockgym.com.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the back room by the office.
item.name: Organizer-Planning Meeting | New Haven Rock Climbing
